entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
